nodes.text: Emergency Code Zero was an Imperial emergency code. If a ship were to receive this signal, it was to immediately divert from its current task and assist.

The code was activated at the Space Battle at Kuat, when ships of the Rebellion attacked a shipyard over the planet. The activation of the code resulted in the Star Destroyer Tyranny being diverted from its post at Fresia, where it had been stationed by Darth Vader
himself.
